item.title: Max Cavalera
item.description: Massimiliano Antonio 'Max' Cavalera is a Brazilian singer, guitarist, and songwriter who currently plays in heavy metal bands Soulfly, Cavalera Conspiracy, and Killer Be Killed. In 1984, he co-founded the acclaimed thrash metal band Sepultura with his brother Igor Cavalera and was the band's lead singer and rhythm guitarist until he left in 1996. Cavalera was also involved in a short-lived side project called Nailbomb.

item.title: Mark Morton
item.description: Mark P Morton is the lead guitarist of the American heavy metal band Lamb of God.

item.title: Jason Newsted
item.description: Jason Curtis Newsted is an American metal musician, known for being the bassist of the band Metallica from October 1986 until his sudden departure in January 2001.

item.title: Phil Anselmo
item.description: Philip Hansen Anselmo is an American heavy metal musician who is best known as the lead vocalist for Pantera, Down, and Superjoint Ritual. He is also the owner of Housecore Records and has been involved with several other bands.

item.title: Corey Taylor
item.description: Corey Todd Taylor is an American singer, songwriter, actor and author and publisher. He is known as the lead vocalist and lyricist of the bands Slipknot and Stone Sour.

item.title: Roy Mayorga
item.description: Roy Maurice Mayorga is an American musician, best known as the drummer for the American heavy metal bands Hellyeah and Stone Sour. He is of Ecuadorian and Cuban descent.
